ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Irish stout beer (e.g. Guinness(r))

cookingTips: Brown sugar and beer create a rich glaze; the Guinness adds depth without overwhelming the beef
Cook on low for tender, fall-apart meat; high heat will toughen the brisket
The corning spice packet already on the brisket provides saltiness, so taste before adding extra salt
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple but forgiving recipe. Are you making this for a crowd, and do you need timing help for a specific dinner hour?
